name: MASH: Valentines Edition
description:
THE ORIGINAL MASH GAME FOR IPHONE & IPOD TOUCH, NOW IN VALENTINES DAY EDITION!

MASH (Mansion, Apartment, Shack, House) is the game that tells your future, like where you'll live, who you'll marry, and more.

But this time is different. This time, MASH will tell you an entertaining St. Valentine's Day story!

Play it with your friends!

Easy to pick up and play.

Draw a spiral and watch MASH determine your story! Or, if you're feeling brave, let MASH choose.
